title: Evaluating the Role of Kinetic Energy on Asteroid Impacts

previous.title: Calculating the Kinetic Energy of an Asteroid

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Compare the kinetic energy values you calculated for each asteroid.  Rank, from largest to smallest, the size of the impact crater that would be caused by asteroids #1, #2, and #3.  Does this ranking agree with the prediction you previously made?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Which would have a greater influence on the size of the impact crater: doubling the mass or doubling the velocity of an asteroid?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Earth orbits the Sun counterclockwise (as seen from the northern hemisphere). Which asteroid do you think would cause more damage: one that also orbits counterclockwise, or one that orbits clockwise? (Hint: think about what would cause more damage in a car accident, a head-on collision or a car being rear-ended.) Explain.
